author: Pirjo L
title: Excellent hotel, excellent service - Review
text:
We were travelling with my cousin, celebrating her 75-years anniversary during our trip.
We chose Beijing Hotel Nuo due to a perfect location to see the most important sights of Beijing and the place appeared to be such. Our stay was a trip to remember because of the service we got. Ms Khan and the whole concierge team made our stay very comfortable and arranged all the nice things for the birthday including a birthday cake and bucket of lovely roses. Hotel manager, Mr Thesing, also did his utmost for us to enjoy our visit. Thank you! We can really recommend this stylish NUO-chain hotel.
